attributes.action: Theresa May should resign as Prime Minister with immediate effect.
attributes.additional_details: Theresa May has acted in the worst tradition of failed leaders such as Neville Chamberlain, in appeasing and bowing down to fascist ideology in the interests of personal prestige. This is unacceptable and she should resign.
attributes.background: Theresa May has shown herself to be a supporter of clearly fascist policies, and thus unable to stand up for the hard earned values of the British people.

rejection.details:
The resignation of an individual Minister is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/178727
